entry.name: icon
entry.label: The name of the icon to use for the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).

entry.name: useCustomButtonImage
entry.label: Whether to use a custom image instead of an icon in the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).

entry.name: customButtonImage
entry.label: The URL of the custom image to use instead of an icon in the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).

entry.name: showIcons
entry.label: Whether to show icons in the menu.

entry.name: menuWidth
entry.label: Width of the menu dropdown in pixels. Use 0 for default width.

entry.name: buttonHeight
entry.label: Height of each menu item (button) in pixels. Use 0 for default height.

entry.name: menuJson
entry.label: JSON object defining the menu structure. Each item can have: name, icon, command, submenu (array of items), separator (bool).
